summary_gpt: Hindustan Construction Company announced a scheduled virtual meeting with analysts and institutional investors on May 8, 2025, as part of its ongoing investor relations activities. The meeting details have been disclosed publicly and are subject to change if necessary.

Hindustan Construction Company Ltd. announced a board meeting scheduled for May 8, 2025, to approve financial results for FY2025 and consider raising funds through securities issuance. The company has also closed its trading window for insiders from April 1, 2025, until 48 hours after the results are announced.
